Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay!!”
Reviews.Author: Randy W
Reviews.Content: Our buisness places us here on a weekly basis, the staff are always polite & professional. I would bring my family here because of the clean rooms & hospitality that is shown towards me when I stay here. 4 thumbs up!!!! come experience this for yourself.

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT STAY HERE”
Reviews.Author: Jamie_L_D
Reviews.Content: There is so many better options in Montreal to stay, this is the last place you will want to stay at. The Holiday Inn down town was A LOT nicer and cheaper. This place charged us an extra 100$ because apparently their maids could not put some bottles in a garbage bag. There was 4 of us in the room, it is not like we had a party or anything. We just had a couple drinks before we went out. So when I say SOME bottles, I mean like 10 beer bottles. The bedding was dirty, the shower/tub was disgusting, and the shower head was no good. You hear air planes flying over you in the middle of the night. The service was terrible, If you just want to stay at a place for a night while your waiting for your flight, I suggest you sleep at the airport. If you are staying in Montreal for the weekend, I recommend the Holiday Inn down town. Whatever you do, do not stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Stay Away”
Reviews.Author: M S
Reviews.Content: This would be the last hotel I would choose if I ever return to Montreal to stay overnight. The place just feels old, dirty and unkempt. The shuttle service was not available so it cost us another $22 to stay. The carpet looked gross in the room, the shower curtain was all torn and hanging off the rod. There was nothing pleasing whatsoever about this hotel. Dark and dingy--gave me the creeps.

Reviews.Title: “Near airport, smoking everywhere”
Reviews.Author: Aviatorstarboy
Reviews.Content: Welcome to Montreal, and light up! That is what you will be greeted by once you enter this establishment. The shuttle to the Inn was on time and ok, however the Inn really needs to get its stuff together. The lobby is small, cramped style, un-kept, not vacuumed, tobacco smokey and drab to say the least. The hallway smell big time of cigarette smoke, and the room was NASTY !!!!!! I requested a non smoking room the nights before, however....guess what, yes a smoking room. And when I brought a smoking hotel front desk clerk to the room to see the broken sliding door to the parking lot on the other side of the room, she thought the smell was horrible!! That speaks volumes. The continental breakfast is average, however again the smoke smell is every where. Over all, sure the price may be low, but you get less that you pay for here. The bedding is really uncomfortable, and the hotel is on a busy route. Just do your homework, there must be better options near by. Good luck on your search, especially if you do not smoke.

Reviews.Title: “Really noisy - definitely not a 4*”
Reviews.Author: paddling_kiki
Reviews.Content: We won the hotel by purchasing on Priceline - and Priceline indicated that it was a 4* hotel. I definitely would not consider a 4* (probably not even a 3*). A group of us booked, and we were told when we called that it would be no problem to have rooms with two queens. Sure enough, we ended up not having enough beds for all the people to sleep in, and some of the girls had to get cots. Our room was on the first floor and quite close to the reception desk. The hotel is located right by the airport, and right by the highway. Needless to say, between the uncomfortable beds, highway noise, airport noise and constant activity at the check in desk - I got about 2 hours sleep (and I'm not someone who has problems sleeping at hotels). For 169$ a night, I would go elsewhere

Reviews.Title: “Terrible hotel, good location to Mtl airport.”
Reviews.Author: Soulia
Reviews.Content: We decided to take advantage of the stay/park package. It ends up being a good rate but not enough to stay there again. The check in/check out was terrible. Our non-smoking room smelled like an old tavern. The bed was comfortable, clean sheets. Parking: cars are everywhere in parking lot, serves its purpose but looks terrible. Shuttle service was okay and on time. The drive almost hit 2 cars on the way out of the parking lot and didn't seem to care really. Short distance from airport, right off the highway. Good for a one night stay if like us, you need to catch an early flight.

Reviews.Title: “only one night hotel.”
Reviews.Author: sacchinT
Reviews.Content: We stayed in this hotel for 2 nights with 3 other family friends on our way to Montreal & Quebec. It was a very bad experience.. specially when we found that AC is not working.. Not all rooms were equipped with mini refrigerator. bed & bathroom is not so good.. not worth for price.. I would advise to pay little more & stay in better hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Getting better”
Reviews.Author: flumeboy04
Reviews.Content: Good location if you're travelling through Montreal by car - easy highway access. Currently under renovations but looks to be getting better.
